summary: Filmmaker Mike Nichols sits down with theater director Jack O'Brien to discuss his personal life and professional work.
cast: Ann-Margret|Anne Bancroft|Richard Burton|Leslie Caron|Dustin Hoffman|Lee Marvin|Elaine May|Mike Nichols|Jack O'Brien|Sidney Poitier|Vanessa Redgrave|Katharine Ross|Meryl Streep|Elizabeth Taylor
title: Becoming Mike Nichols
